main event: On April 22, 1963, a daughter reported to her father that an old house was observed moving and then disappeared in the Speedway, Indiana area.
interesting points: The object was described as a light that hovered at a height estimated between 800-1000 ft,The daughter saw the object moving overhead at a diameter of 100 ft and a distance of 2 miles made judging its movement difficult,The father suggested it was probably an aircraft reported in the area at the time,The observation lasted approximately 3 minutes,This sighting was documented under Project Blue Book.
sighted object: A light that was possibly an old house moving
